§ 603. Regulations The Secretary concerned and the Secretary of Veterans Affairs shall prescribe regulations necessary to carry out this chapter. (Pub. L. 87–649, Sept. 7, 1962, 76 Stat. 484; Pub. L. 101–189, div. A, title XVI, § 1621(b)(2), Nov. 29, 1989, 103 Stat. 1604.)
